tasks.title: BUGFIX: Convert PromptCard from card grid to compact row list
tasks.description: Current implementation mismatch: UI-UX-DESIGN.md specifies that compact mode should display prompts as ROWS (table-like list), while expanded mode should display prompts as CARDS. However, the current PromptCard implementation uses Card component in a grid layout (visually expanded/card style) but without content preview (functionally compact). This is a hybrid that doesn't match either specification. The fix should convert the current view to a proper row/list layout as specified for compact mode in the design system.
dod: Replace grid card layout with row-based list layout
Each prompt displayed as a horizontal row, not a card
Row contains: title, folder badge, tags (max 3 + counter), visibility icon, relative date, use_count, copy button
NO Card component wrapper - use simple row/flex layout
Maintain hover state (subtle background change instead of shadow)
Copy button aligned to the right of the row
Responsive: stack elements on smaller screens if needed
Remove PromptCardSkeleton or update to row skeleton
tests: E2E: prompts displayed as horizontal rows, not cards
E2E: row layout matches compact mode specification
E2E: all data fields visible in row
E2E: copy button works in row layout
E2E: click navigates to prompt detail
